column2: and the beneficiaries receive 30-36 Euros a month. Most beneficiaries only receive money for six months

column1: The Mastercard programme was established with the involvement of Mastercard
column2: the Serbian Ministry of Labour and Mercy Corps to provide debit cards to refugees to meet basic needs. Families received cards with EUR 210 and individuals got EUR 70. The money could be used to help meet basic needs. Later
column3: in January 2017 Soros and Mastercard launched a new programme providing private sector solutions to social issues.

column1: The UNCHR has been involved with a program to provide cash to refugees via debit cards to help meet immediate needs
column2: and George Soros has been involved with a program to assist migrants in partnership with MasterCard
column3: but Soros is not funding the distribution of MasterCard debit cards to refugees via the United Nations.
